channel.title: [Misc] - Positive Politics I - Signups (2/6)
channel.description:
**Welcome to Positive Politics I!** -
Hosted by @KyoDaz This setup follows simple forum rules.
1. https://toli.es/rules 2. https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926/
The setup will start once 6 players have signed up. Backups and spectators are welcomed.
**Gameplay** -
The [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color] is the town faction. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] is the mafia faction.
>**Experiment: Positivity Modifier** > >**This is an experimental modifier. It may be subject to change during the game, after the game or prior to the game.** > >The positivity modifier is a modifier that restricts you from voting for the lynch if what you have done is deemed as not positive or against the community rules. This will be announced publically and you will not count towards majority. Insulting of the person will result in immediate restriction. Community rules will be more strict than normal here.
>**Experiment: Public Votecount Modifier** > >**This is an experimental modifier. It may be subject to change during the game, after the game or prior to the game.** > >The first vote in this thread will be a wikiposted votecount. You are allowed to edit it. Editting another player's vote is strictly prohibited (provided you aren't fixing it). You are only allowed to edit your own and the numbers.
**Executions** -
The lynch time limit is 36 hours. Failure to vote anyone will result in a random [color=#FFD505]Resident[/color] perishing. A tie in plurality votes will result in a coin toss. To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Please make sure you put votes on a seperate post. Executions do not end the day as the day is infinite. Executions will be majority + plurality.
**To Join** -
To join, please '**/in**'
**Role List** -
[color=#FFD505]First Minister[/color] [color=#FFD505]Resident[/color] [color=#FFD505]Resident[/color] [color=#FFD505]Resident[/color] [color=#FFD505]Resident[/color] [color=#FFF1E6]Candidate[/color]
**Role Cards** -
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/kyodazs-class-itemcard-thread/78731/
Players:
1. JakeTheWolfie 2. Isaac_Gonzalez 3. 4. 5. 6.
Backups:
1. 2. 3.
Spectators:
1. 2. 3.
Timestamps / Moments of Significance -
First Execution Second Execution Third Execution Fourth Execution

item.title: [Misc] - Positive Politics I - Signups (2/6)
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Welcome to Positive Politics I!

Hosted by @KyoDaz
This setup follows simple forum rules.

  1. https://toli.es/rules
  2. https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926/

The setup will start once 6 players have signed up. Backups and spectators are welcomed.

Gameplay

The Yellow Poppy is the town faction.
The White Primrose is the mafia faction.

Experiment: Positivity Modifier

This is an experimental modifier. It may be subject to change during the game, after the game or prior to the game.

The positivity modifier is a modifier that restricts you from voting for the lynch if what you have done is deemed as not positive or against the community rules.
This will be announced publically and you will not count towards majority.
Insulting of the person will result in immediate restriction.
Community rules will be more strict than normal here.

Experiment: Public Votecount Modifier

This is an experimental modifier. It may be subject to change during the game, after the game or prior to the game.

The first vote in this thread will be a wikiposted votecount. You are allowed to edit it.
Editting another player’s vote is strictly prohibited (provided you aren’t fixing it). You are only allowed to edit your own and the numbers.

Executions

The lynch time limit is 36 hours. Failure to vote anyone will result in a random Resident perishing.
A tie in plurality votes will result in a coin toss.
To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]”
Please make sure you put votes on a seperate post.
Executions do not end the day as the day is infinite.
Executions will be majority + plurality.

To Join

To join, please ‘/in’

Role List

First Minister
Resident
Resident
Resident
Resident
Candidate

Role Cards

https://forum.imperium42.com/t/kyodazs-class-itemcard-thread/78731/

Players:

  1. JakeTheWolfie
  2. Isaac_Gonzalez

Backups:
